backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing leads, user profiles, and admin authorization with CRUD-style queries and bootstrap token initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten descriptions summarizing all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global background/text utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, Inter font loading, and mounting the React root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router-like component using pushState to render homepage sections or specific pages, including insights article routing.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Form component allowing admins to grant admin privileges by validating a Principal ID and calling the backend actor method.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminToken: Handles submission of a bootstrap token for initializing the first admin, with success and error feedback.
frontend/src/components/contact/CompanyP: Dialog form for collecting lead details and triggering company profile download after successful submission.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactO: Grid of contact options including booking a call, downloading the company profile, sending an email, or initiating WhatsApp messaging.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, attribution, and a caffeine.ai link with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/forms/ControlLea: Lead generation form that validates user details and submits company challenge information via the lead submission hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/FounderCon: Inquiry form for the Founder Control Blueprint collecting company and bottleneck details and submitting them as a lead.
frontend/src/components/forms/Industries: A lead generation form collecting company and contact details, validating inputs, and submitting via useLeadSubmission with a success state display.
frontend/src/components/forms/InsightsNe: A newsletter subscription form validating basic company and email fields, submitting via useLeadSubmission, and showing a confirmation state.
frontend/src/components/forms/ProcessLea: A lead gen form for operational challenges with validation, submission through useLeadSubmission, and handling retry and success states.
frontend/src/components/forms/StrategySe: A detailed strategy session application form collecting company, systems, and bottleneck data, validating inputs, and submitting via useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/industries/CaseS: A card component displaying a case study with options to view details or open a PDF, depending on available data.
A modal rendering full case study details with dynamic list or paragraph formatting and close controls.
frontend/src/components/industries/indus: Defines TypeScript models and static content for industries, including services, solutions, and case studies.
frontend/src/components/industries/Indus: Renders an industry section showing challenges, solutions, major service tiles, and case studies with optional click handling.
frontend/src/components/industries/Major: Displays a service tile with an image and label, falling back to a placeholder on image load failure.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopContr: Floating button that appears after scrolling and smoothly scrolls back to the top.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Shows contact information and a button to schedule a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/Control: Displays the CONTROL framework steps in a scrollable grid with images and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Emotion: Presents a motivational message about founder dependency using a styled dark theme block.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Provides a final call-to-action with heading, description, and a button to book a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the hero area with a background gradient and the HeroSlider component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSli: Implements a multi-slide hero carousel with CTAs, navigation, drag/swipe support, and smooth scrolling behaviors.
frontend/src/components/sections/Industr: Renders a section listing four target industry groups with icons, titles, and descriptions in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Insight: Displays three featured insight articles and a button to view all, with client-side navigation handlers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Outcome: Shows post‑implementation outcomes using a bullet list and a dashboard visual.
frontend/src/components/sections/PageHer: Provides a configurable hero section with title, optional text, background image, and child content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Lists five common business problems with icons and a concluding statement about systems issues.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Implements an accordion showing four structured process steps with descriptions and detail lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/TechSta: Displays a grid of technology logos with labels under a section header.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIno: Shows three feature cards describing control, clarity, and continuity with icons and text.
frontend/src/components/shared/StandardB: Exports bullet list components rendering items with checkmark icons and optional styling.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, hash-based home navigation, and pushState route handling for page links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInitializatio: Fetches and exposes whether the admin setup is initialized using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminLeads.ts: Fetches all leads for admin users with identity-scoped caching, retry logic, and backend health‑aware reconnection.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current identity is an admin, handling auth errors gracefully and supporting connection retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Runs a backend health check via the actor, returning reachability status and allowing manual rechecks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead data to the backend with loading, error handling, health checks, and retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced‑motion preference using a media query listener.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, utilities, dark mode, and reduced‑motion rules.
frontend/src/lib/contactConfig.ts: Exports centralized contact configuration including URLs, email, phone, and address.
frontend/src/lib/strategyCall.ts: Navigates the user to the strategy‑session page using history and smooth scroll.
frontend/src/lib/techStackLogos.ts: Defines a list of tech‑stack logo descriptors for homepage display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page handling authentication, admin checks, lead fetching, token generation, and related UI actions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with hero, contact options, an inquiry form, and qualification details, including hash-based auto-scroll behavior.
Displays the CONTROL framework overview, its stages, and a lead-generation section with smooth-scroll navigation.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders a hero section and an accordion-based FAQ list with structured answers and a final CTA.
frontend/src/pages/IndustriesPage.tsx: Shows industry-specific blocks, a hero with CTA, case study modal logic, and a lead-generation section.
frontend/src/pages/insights/CanYourBusin: Displays the 'Can Your Business Run Without You?' insight article using the shared layout and dynamic article content.
frontend/src/pages/insights/components/I: Provides the shared article layout with SEO setup, hero display, back navigation, and prose container for article content.
frontend/src/pages/insights/components/u: React hook that sets and restores document title and meta description for insight article pages.
frontend/src/pages/insights/CrmVsErpWhat: Renders the CRM vs ERP insight article by mapping section data into the common article layout.
frontend/src/pages/insights/ExcelIsNotAB: Shows the 'Excel Is Not a Business System' insight article using the standard layout and structured sections.
frontend/src/pages/insights/FromFounderD: Renders the 'From Founder-Driven to System-Driven' article with headings and paragraphs from the article dataset.
frontend/src/pages/insights/insightArtic: Defines the insight article data objects, including slugs, titles, descriptions, and section content.
frontend/src/pages/insights/insightSlugs: Exports canonical slugs, titles, ordering, and helpers for validating and resolving insight article slugs.
frontend/src/pages/insights/TheHiddenCos: Displays the 'Hidden Cost of Manual Reporting' insight article using the shared article layout.
frontend/src/pages/insights/WhyGrowthBre: Renders the 'Why Growth Breaks Weak Infrastructure' article with dynamically mapped sections.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Displays a hero, article grid with click navigation, metadata updates, and a newsletter signup.
frontend/src/pages/ProcessPage.tsx: Outlines the company’s multi-stage transformation process with hero, philosophy, and staged breakdown sections.
frontend/src/pages/StrategySessionPage.t: Renders the Strategy Session landing page with a hero, target-audience sections, and a scroll-to-form CTA. Includes smooth scrolling and focus behavior for the application form.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query strings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project’s themed UI.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, feature requests, and styling requirements for generating and exposing an INOVICS presentation deck.
